description.en: A shortened DTDL Model Identifier (doesn't include the full path or version)  of an asset or group of assets that are connected to this electrical distribution equipment (i.e. HVACEquipment, AirHandlingUnit).
The percent of the total energy consumed by this electrical distribution equipment that this load classification accounts for.
The total apparent power in VA connected to this electrical distribution equipment that this load classification accounts for.
The percent of the connected load that is consuming energy at any given time. This can be used to calculate the demand load as a percentage of the connected load.
